mdRecord.dcterms:title: Pocket instrument set
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Max Wocher & Son [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contained in leather and fabric case. Set includes: 2 male catheters, curved artery forceps, curved forceps, exploring needle, probe-point bistoury, tenatome, spatula, tongue tie, teo tenaculums, artery forceps, curved probe-point bistoury, 2 emory boards, lancet, 4 curved needles.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments and apparatus--Surgical instruments and apparatus
